snippet.title: Storyboard vs Code SpeedRun - Which is Faster? (iOS Swift 4)
snippet.description:
It's always interesting to answer the question of which is better: Storyboard or Code/Programmatic?  In today's video, I wanted to go through a speedrun of building out a somewhat simple application using both approaches.  

Without having to record live:
Storyboard ~ 10-11 mins
Code ~ 4-5 mins

Intermediate Training Core Data
